structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.text:
A road may be designated a scenic byway or scenic highway if it has a minimum of one
intrinsic quality as defined in KRS 177.571; a limit on existing visual intrusions that significantly impact the road; and a local support group that has requested scenic designation for the road and that is committed to maintaining the intrinsic qualities of the area surrounding the road.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 566, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
